requirements.title: Single-Page Checkout
requirements.description: Consolidate the checkout process into a single, scrollable page with sections for cart summary, shipping information, payment method, and order review.
acceptance_criteria: Checkout process is on a single page
Cart summary is collapsible on mobile devices
Page is responsive and fast

ambiguity_flags.issue: The term 'fast and responsive' is not defined with specific performance metrics.
ambiguity_flags.suggested_action: Define specific performance metrics, such as page load time under 2 seconds.

requirements.title: Guest Checkout
requirements.description: Allow users to complete purchases without creating an account, requiring only an email address for order confirmation.
acceptance_criteria: Users can checkout without account creation
Email address is required for order confirmation
Option to create an account post-purchase with one click
Guest orders are stored and linked by email

requirements.title: Address Autocomplete
requirements.description: Implement address autocomplete using Google Places API to support international addresses and validate them before submission.
acceptance_criteria: Address autocomplete is implemented using Google Places API
Supports international addresses
Validates addresses before submission
Displays 'We can't deliver here' for unsupported regions

requirements.title: Multiple Payment Methods
requirements.description: Support a variety of payment options including credit/debit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Buy Now Pay Later (Klarna).
acceptance_criteria: Support for Visa, Mastercard, and Amex
Support for PayPal
Support for Apple Pay on Safari/iOS
Support for Google Pay on Chrome/Android
Support for Buy Now Pay Later with Klarna

ambiguity_flags.issue: The term 'seamless' for payment processing is not defined with specific criteria.
ambiguity_flags.suggested_action: Define what constitutes 'seamless' payment processing, such as transaction completion within 5 seconds.

requirements.title: Real-time Validation
requirements.description: Validate form fields in real-time as the user types, showing inline errors.
acceptance_criteria: Email format is validated
Card number is validated using Luhn algorithm
Expiration date is validated to not be in the past
CVV is validated to be 3-4 digits
Shipping address completeness is validated
Inline errors are displayed

requirements.title: Order Summary
requirements.description: Display an itemized order summary including product details, pricing, and totals.
acceptance_criteria: Displays product thumbnails, names, and quantities
Shows individual prices and line totals
Displays subtotal, shipping cost, tax, discount codes, and grand total

requirements.title: Promo Code Support
requirements.description: Allow users to enter promo codes and see the discount applied to their order.
acceptance_criteria: Single input field for promo code with 'Apply' button
Displays success/error message
Shows discount amount
Supports percentage and fixed discounts
Validates code server-side

summary: Redesign the e-commerce checkout process to reduce cart abandonment and improve conversion rates by implementing a single-page checkout, guest checkout, address autocomplete, multiple payment methods, real-time validation, order summary, and promo code support.
